title: Van Nuys Studio w/ AC, Fridge +2 Weeks Free + $1000 OFF Special!
posting_body: ['2 Weeks Free Look and Lease Special +$1000 OFF Move in Special!', '6920 Sepulveda Boulevard', 'Van Nuys, CA 91405', 'show contact info', 'Welcome to Royal Sepulveda Apartment Homes!', 'Enjoy community amenities such as a sparkling swimming pool, plenty of parking, and on-site laundry.', 'Come home to your comfortable studio apartment with air conditioning, a built-in dresser, a gas stove, and a refrigerator.', 'Royal Sepulveda Apartment Homes are in a prime location close to the 405 Freeway, public transportation, shopping and restaurants.', 'Stop by today and say hello to our professional management staff and find your new home!', 'Property Features:', '- On-Call Maintenance', '- Close to the 405 Freeway', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Bike Racks', '- Easy Access to Shopping', '- Swimming Pool', '- Laundry Facility', '- Courtyard', '- On-Site Manager', '- Close to Public Transportation', 'Apartment Features:', '- Carpeting', '- Built-In Dresser', '- Large Closets', '- Refrigerator', '- Gas Range', '- Disposal', '- Air Conditioning', 'Price and availability are subject to change.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Photos may not be of exact unit.']
